short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web player to easily create and replay sections from videos on any site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple video player that can run on any website. It allows you to mark sections of videos and navigate between them. You can bookmark, repeat, color-code and jump between sections.

Any video sections that you bookmark are remembered by the player.
